content: Some time ago I opened https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/82525 to suggest making the unaligned_references lint warn-by-default. I haven't heard back so I just wanted to make sure that adding the "T-lang I-nominated" flag is the right next step here -- or would it make sense for someone to already start the FCP bot process?
It should be correct, we just don't make it all the way through the agenda perhaps?
it looks like last week we talked about it
looks like I had the action item to comment on that :)
• [ ] [2021-03-16]: Niko to addr_of and review pr https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/pull/82525
I have been pretty busy last week, sorry @RalfJ !
No worries, I am just making sure this has not slipped between the cracks :)
